Key Match Events: Seth Johnson's major league debut ended with a seven-run third inning by the Miami Marlins
Connor Norby homered twice in the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Edward Cabrera pitched seven scoreless innings
Bryce Harper had two hits, including an RBI single
Others: The Phillies were managed by Rob Thomson, while the Marlins were managed by Skip Schumaker
The Phillies placed INF Edmundo Sosa on the 10-day injured list, retroactive to Saturday
The Marlins used Lake Bachar in relief, who struck out the side in a perfect inning
